comments.message: I slipped on a banana peel and dropped the camera on the cat and I got a better picture.
comments.name: Elisa Rush

comments.message: When you take a photo, it would be good to remove your finger from the frame. In the end, it's just unprofessional. One thing is unclear: how so?!
comments.name: Elisa Rush

comments.message: My grandmother accidentally sneezed with a camera in her hands and she got a better photo. Shob I lived like this!
comments.name: Brogan Atkins

comments.message: I'm stuck on this photo and I can't tear myself away. I don't know what to do at all. Is this a composition?! What is this composition?!
comments.name: Lexie Castillo

description: Appreciate every moment. Appreciate those who are close to you and drive away all doubts. Don't offend everyone with words

comments.message: I lost my family, children and cat because of this photo. They said they didn't share my love for art and went to a neighbor. Everything is fine!
comments.name: Cordelia Barrett

description: If you clearly formulate a wish for the universe, then everything will definitely come true. Believe in yourself. The main thing is to want and dream.

comments.message: I can't imagine how you can photograph the sea and sunset better. This is just the apogee. After that, we can burn all the cameras, because the peak has been reached anyway. The focus is blurred. Or is it just someone splattered the lens?
comments.name: Brogan Atkins

comments.message: I lost my family, children and cat because of this photo. They said they didn't share my love for art and went to a neighbor. Everything is fine!
comments.name: Alessandro Alvarez

description: How cool is the food here

comments.message: The faces of the people in the photo are distorted, as if they are being beaten. How could you catch such an unfortunate moment?! The horizon is littered.
comments.name: Lulu Estes
